name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Drupal Engineer with extensive experience in achieving high-quality application performance through test automation and security testing in compliance with FedRAMP and FISMA standards. Proficient in **AWS** and **Azure**, with a solid understanding of **CI/CD** principles. Deep knowledge in Agile methodologies and experienced with performance testing using tools like **Apache JMeter** and **Cypress**. Skilled in conducting API and database testing, ensuring robust application functionality.

Additionally, I bring over 13 years of comprehensive full stack development experience, leveraging my expertise in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, Python, and **Flutter**. Proven capability in both frontend and backend technologies such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. An advocate for compliance-driven development, I align solutions with standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2, while also being experienced in building AI/ML-powered platforms and MLOps frameworks with **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
